Solution - Lab 3: Mathematical Notation in Quarto

MAT 186: Introduction to Data Science

Author

Instructor

Modified

February 7, 2026

Lab 3: Official Solutions

ImportantInstructor Key Required

This page contains the LaTeX code for the Standard Deviation formula.

üìù Lab Task 3: Standard Deviation Formula

To display the formula correctly in Quarto, the student should have typed the following LaTeX code in their document:

$$s = \sqrt{\frac{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})^2}{n - 1}}$$

## Lab 3: Official Solutions

::: {.callout-important}
### Instructor Key Required
This page contains the LaTeX code for the Standard Deviation formula.
:::

### üìù Lab Task 3: Standard Deviation Formula

To display the formula correctly in Quarto, the student should have typed the following LaTeX code in their document:

```latex
$$s = \sqrt{\frac{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})^2}{n - 1}}$$

:::
